title: Schlafly Tap Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Please confirm if there are vegan options and let HappyCow know. Has a few veg items such as the grilled vegetable & black bean burger, falafel sandwich (tzatziki, tomato, onion, harissa, pita), and vegetable vindaloo (spicy curry with basmati rice and pepita seeds). Restaurant and bar located next to the Schlafly Brewery in Saint Louis. Another location at 7260 Southwest Ave,
St. Louis.
